title: Cameos and Games!
author: JGray
text:
Hidden Name: ray4

Cameos: heatherhobbit and Holly B.

And we move from the wonders of romance to the wonders of cyberspace! Surgeon gets his moment in the spotlight!

In other news, I recently completed Phoenix Wright, Ace Attorney: Dual Destinies on my iPad and I highly recommend it for fans of the series (it is also available on the 3DS). It was the best game since the first one, honestly. Maybe even better. I've moved onto Mind Zero for the PS Vita. I'll give a play report once I've finished that one for y'all.

What games are you currently playing?

See you Thursday!

replies.author: Gunsolo*Guest*
replies.text: Currently playing One Finger Death Punch, Monaco and TF2 on occasion. Don't really have much time to play though since I'm so busy at school.
